title: Episode 127 (video): Phrenology: Maybe They Were On To Something
description: Everyone can picture one of those phrenology heads with personality traits drawn into different sections of the cranium.  Was there anything to that?  Well, not exactly. However, with the use of MRI scans researchers today may have found something just about as good - they may have located where certain personality traits lie in your brain.  Travel with me into a 3D brain and let's find out where your personality may lie.
